website_summaries.verdict: With three cushions and an adjustable sun shade, this swing gives you options.
pros: Crafted with durable powder-coated steel frame
Three removable cushions and one pillow
Polyester fabric canopy provides UV and sunlight protection
Measures 78.7 inches long by 50 inches wide by 70.9 inches high
cons: Cushions are not as high-quality as frame

customer_reviews.title: Picture Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I finally have a back yard and I wanted to decorate it in a functional way! I recently purchased a hammock from this seller and was so impressed by it that I decided to purchase my patio swing from them as well. It's literally perfect! The hardware came so neatly laid out and the instructions were very clear. The cushions are thick and comfortable and I absolutely love the brown tones. It's a very sturdy frame but the decorative touches make it gorgeous. The adjustable canopy is also very handy so that we aren't baking in the direct sun. This patio swing is easily twice the quality as the swing comparably priced at my local home store.
customer_reviews.author: Sara C

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but not great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice swing, however, not sure it is worth the $550+ i paid versus what else is out there that is half the price. Button on cushion fell off within 3 days and attached drink shelves are cheap plastic. At this price cushions are pretty thin, which was a disappointment. I guess time will tell on the long term durability. I purchased in April 2016. Ok, but not great.
customer_reviews.author: Burns

customer_reviews.title: The bench is built very well and is amazing. The only complaint is the upholstery
customer_reviews.text: The bench is built very well and is amazing. The only complaint is the upholstery. If some buttons could be sewn better and the cushion could be a little thicker and softer.
customer_reviews.author: Anna B.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty metal frame with a powder coated finish. Easy to assemble, I did it by myself, with the included tools. Two people can easily move it around when assembled. Swings nice and easy with no frame wobble, feels very sturdy. The frame is easy to clean with a damp rag. The finished seat pads are approximately 2.5 inches thick, a 3.5 inch thick pad would be better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice size seems sturdy and I like the sun shade ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice size seems sturdy and I like the sun shade and little trays. We like swinging and feeding the fish, reading the paper etc. Only complaint is that a seat cushion button was off. I tried sewing it on because i didn't want the agrivation of returning it. .
customer_reviews.author: Diane Hoenig

customer_reviews.title: Nice rocker bench
customer_reviews.text: Had it one year. Middle button on cushion was found popped off while in storage over the winter. I will see if manufacturer will send me a new cushion?? The actual clasp on back of button is plastic and broke where I cannot reattach to the string. So I glued to spot...not sure if will last. Otherwise the bench is great! Heavy duty. The cushions are not made to get wet, so finding a good cover is hard that doesn't tear or get pushed around by the wind. I wish the cushions and top had been rain proof. But it looks really beautiful and is comfortable. Rocks quietly and smooth. Heavy to move to the garage in winter...takes 2 people.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic 3-seat Swing
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this swing. Had a cheaper version for many years from a box store. It finally gave out and there was no way to repair it. Debated about spending so much on this swing as opposed to the ones in the box store. So glad I did. It is super comfortable and should last for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this swing.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the swing. It’s actually a little oversized and easily accommodates two big men. The construction was fairly easy and I know I’ll never have to buy another one because of its sturdiness. The Arning is adjustable and it it is exactly what I was looking for love this swing.
customer_reviews.author: Nanat94

customer_reviews.title: Nice swing but was not new
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and durable. Not difficult to assemble. My daughter and I put together in about an hour or so. Only issue wS that the canopy came with stains that we have not been able to get out. Parts were all 9ver the box so that tells me someone else had returned it. For the money we paid I would expect to get a new one. Smh
customer_reviews.author: Dave G

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and wasn't that hard you put together
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and wasn't that hard you put together. My wife and I are larger people and holds up fine for us together we weigh about 525 pounds
customer_reviews.author: soccerbumm

customer_reviews.title: This a great swing! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: We just got this 2 person swing and so far we are very impressed by it. It is sturdy, well designed, stable, stylish, and comfortable. My lady and I put it together in about 40 minutes and that was with us taking our time. We would highly recommend this swing! Please read and heed the reviews that discuss the incorrect instructions regarding which bolts to use for attaching the swing supports to the swing seat. As the other reviews state
customer_reviews.author: John Palatella

customer_reviews.title: Solid product.
customer_reviews.text: I received the item on time with no defects. With exception of the hooking up of the swing chair on the hook and the canopy, I managed to set everything else up on my own. The directions are super easy to follow and the product is very sturdy- I like it a lot! Only complain that I can think of is that my canopy has two tiny holes in it. But I am being excessively picky.
customer_reviews.author: iObserve

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful swing. Was a gift for mother in law
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful swing. Was a gift for mother in law. She loves it! There is a fold down table on both sides.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My wife love this swing. ”Happy Wife Happy Life. Great price
customer_reviews.author: Stingray

customer_reviews.title: It is well made & sturdy. The side tables are a handy feature
customer_reviews.text: We purchased as a gift for my in laws. It is well made & sturdy. The side tables are a handy feature. We all love it. Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed customer
customer_reviews.text: Product is cheaply made. Stitching is already coming out and I just had it put together by a professional. Buttons on cushions were either broken or missing. Material is not a scotchguard /weatherproof material as stated. Very disappointed as it was more expensive than most swings. Am returning this and requesting a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie McAngus

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: We received this item today. We were very excited so we have started assembling the product. Later we find out that J Rodes are missing
customer_reviews.author: jinit

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent swing! It's big! I wanted something I could lay down on (I'm 5 feet 6 inches tall), so this was perfect! When I received the item, the cushions had black stains on them, but I received excellent customer service that went above and beyond and the cushions were replaced. I'm very happy with this swing. Friends have commented how it's "so much better" than theirs, due to the size and quality. Looks very nice! My brother put it up in under an hour with the help of my mother. It fits three average sized people, but if someone overweight sits in the middle, whoever sits on the sides will feel like they're leaning towards the middle.
customer_reviews.author: PianoGirlO

customer_reviews.title: Swing
customer_reviews.text: Great swing. Very sturdy,easy to assemble. One cushion a little darker, but not enough to complain. Love the side tables.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: I bought a two seat outdoor swing and wish I could use it. It is missing some parts. When I contacted Abbapatio, they told me it would take 30 days to receive the missing parts. Not too happy at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Linda P.

customer_reviews.title: packaging was poor..
customer_reviews.text: The swing was not exactly what we expected. First, packaging was poor...The swing arrived with scratches and dents. Next, the framing had missing holes which we had to drill to assemble it. Would NOT recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: jaymcm

customer_reviews.title: easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Like the swing, as it was easy to put together and gets a lot of use during the summer months. Very strong material and holds up well being outside all year.
customer_reviews.author: r

customer_reviews.title: Well designed and built from excellent materials. Haven't assembled canopy yet because location is ...
customer_reviews.text: Completely met expectations. Well designed and built from excellent materials. Haven't assembled canopy yet because location is very windy and am concerned it may act as a wing.
customer_reviews.author: shel

customer_reviews.title: I love this swing I just purchased a home and couldn't ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this swing I just purchased a home and couldn't wait for this to arrive in my new backyard. I had someone install it for me which took him about an hour. It's sturdy/ stylish and super comfortable. Great product great purchase 👍
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: This swing is wonderful. Hesitated spending this much money but like they say, you get what you pay for. My son was looking and I told him, this is the best. He loves ours.
customer_reviews.author: les ruefenacht

customer_reviews.title: Missing part don’t even look strong
customer_reviews.text: One part missing and it’s not easy to install The way it say it atleast you need 2 ppl and 5 hours
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: recommend this swing..you will love it.
customer_reviews.text: easy to put together...good looking....love th ease of just swinging abit..wonderful.....
customer_reviews.author: Anna E. Perry

customer_reviews.title: Strong Frame but cheaply made fabric
customer_reviews.text: Be aware that the cushions and canopy exposed to 6 months of sun and weather deteriorate quickly. None of the fabric items are double stitched at seams and the canopy rips. Buttons also fall off the cushions. Poorly made and not worth the cost unless you plan on ordering extra canopies. Your better off buying from local establishment where you can return the entire swing.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend an assistant to help assemble the kit
customer_reviews.text: Well built, should last a long time. Would recommend an assistant to help assemble the kit, although I managed by myself. The fastener kit was a great aid in keeping bolts and screws secure, while assembly. Glad I made the purchase..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and easy to assemble. The only problem that though it does not affect the use of the product the screw for the left side of canopy cannot be easily tightened. So far we love it.
customer_reviews.author: Zhenqiang Fan

customer_reviews.title: Credit to my account
customer_reviews.text: I'm very unhappy with scratch and finish peel on the right front leg, I need compensation for not so perfect product and send sample of the same finish to apply it
customer_reviews.author: nameer jalel

customer_reviews.title: While the swing is very nice, three of the cushions came with broken buttons
customer_reviews.text: While the swing is very nice, three of the cushions came with broken buttons. The buttons have a very flimsy backing that breaks off easily, so they can’t even be sewn back on.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Conway

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Swing was very nice and sturdy as expected. Excellent customer service. I highly recommend this company and their product.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE our new swing. We were hesitant to order online for furniture but are very pleased with this swing.
customer_reviews.author: Pattie Darling

customer_reviews.title: But very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: It was a little tricky putting it together. But very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Clements

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my swing and customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Terry J. Mahaffey

customer_reviews.title: I love this swing
customer_reviews.text: I love this swing. It is very comfortable and was easy to assemble. We have it in our backyard and sit in it every chance we get!
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This swing is robust and made with good quality materials.
customer_reviews.author: Eswara Rao Pitta

customer_reviews.title: Buy this
customer_reviews.text: This was one of my better amazon purchases. I bought this in the fall and it's still in great shape 6 months later. We had record winds over the winter but the swing wasn't damaged like others I saw in the neighborhood. Do not be fooled by other reviews. It took me an hour just to open the boxes and lay out all the pieces. The manufacturer, however, does a great job with the instructions. It took me about 4 hours to assemble start to finish. Again, this is an awesome swing and well worth the money. The cat is gently rocking herself on it right now.
customer_reviews.author: burgla

customer_reviews.title: We were very pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I bought this for a gift to each other. We were very pleased with it, it was very well made and not hard to assemble. We would recommend this swing to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and very strong and solid. Comfortable!!!
customer_reviews.author: A M.

customer_reviews.title: Just What We Wanted
customer_reviews.text: Perfect by the pool. Easy to assemble. No complaints at all
customer_reviews.author: Dazzle Dog

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy with good appearance.and well made. I was able to erect it myself with easy to follow directions but would recommend to have another person help to lift and steady. Overall very happy with product although a little bit pricey...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The poor rating is because Amazon has so far failed to ...
customer_reviews.text: The product meets all expectation. Assembly instructions were clear except for two bars with slightly different ends and no indication how they matchup. The poor rating is because Amazon has so far failed to credit discount agreed to for late delivery by guaranteed date.
customer_reviews.author: John R. Dahlke

product_meta.title: Abba Patio 2-Person Outdoor Porch Swing Hammock with Steel Frame and Adjustable Tilt Canopy
feature_bullets: Durable powder-coated steel frame support two average-sized people comfortably
Durable canopy top provides comfortable shade and shelter
2 big easy-care, easy-to-clean polyester cushions offer plush comfort
The teapoy on side let you put down a cup of coffee or juice to increase joy of your leisure time
Easy to assemble with included hardware, Weight capacity: 400lbs

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars81 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
